name: Uta
text: On Play: Look at the top 5 cards of your deck, reveal up to 1 "Red Haired Pirates" card and add it to your hand. Then, place the rest at the bottom of your deck in any order.

effect.text: Look at the top 5 cards of your deck, reveal up to 1 "Red Haired Pirates" card and add it to your hand. Then, place the rest at the bottom of your deck in any order.
